We optimize the kinetics manually so that the width is proper.
First lets check if calculating Rin by injecting 5pA current gives correct Rin.

Base - 0.002315618058954527
Na Gbar 1.1x - 0.002364835933540421. 0.9x - 0.0022647042260584005
K_DR Gbar 1.1x - 0.002303266083488742, 0.9x - 0.0023292902614771016
K_A Gbar 1.1x - 0.0023024345506168498, 0.9x - 0.0023810033787772245
K_M Gbar 1.1x - 0.0023152290309287338, 0.9x - 0.0023160074737282876
h Gbar 1.1x - 0.0023156502626504594, 0.9x - 0.002315585954594246
